Type.Name: DeleteRangeHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DeleteRangeHandler(object o, DeleteRangeArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DeleteRangeHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DeleteRangeHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DeleteRangeHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DeleteRangeHandler is removed from the event.
